product_name: REI Cabin Lounger Flannel Pants - Men's
long_description: Enjoy a lazy weekend morning in the soft and comfortable REI Cabin Lounger flannel pants. Organic cotton flannel has a soft hand for great comfort. On-seam hand pockets and a rear patch pocket stow items while you're lounging around the house. The REI Cabin Lounger pants have a relaxed fit; include an elastic waist and drawstring.
short_description: Enjoy a lazy weekend morning in the soft and comfortable REI Cabin Lounger flannel pants.
